entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is trying to defeat Voldemort. ("It's your one last chance," said Harry...)

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The antagonist of the story, who is being threatened by Harry. ("You dare -- ?" said Voldemort again.)

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A character mentioned as having a plan that backfired on Voldemort. ("Dumbledore's last plan hasn't backfired on me at all.")

entities.name: draco
entities.description: A person whose hand Harry is gripping tightly. (The moment... he knew, was seconds away.)

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: A character mentioned as being murdered by Voldemort. ("You murdered the wrong person.")

entities.name: elder wand
entities.description: A magical object that is being used by Voldemort and Harry. (Voldemort's hand was trembling on the Elder Wand...)

relationships.description: Harry is threatening Voldemort, trying to defeat him. ("It's your one last chance," said Harry...)
Dumbledore and Snape planned Dumbledore's death together. (Dumbledore intended to die undefeated, the wand's last true master!)
Harry is gripping Draco's hand tightly. (The moment... he knew, was seconds away.)
Voldemort murdered Snape. ("You murdered the wrong person.")
